course.name: Gemini CLI for Everyone (GC4E): The Art of AI Leverage
course.description: Learn Gemini CLI through hands-on practice in a real scenario. Based on the original 'Claude Code for Everyone' by Carl Vellotti. Adapted and Optimized for Gemini CLI by Sujeong Lim.
course.scenario: Basecamp Coffee - Turn around a struggling loyalty program

modules.name: Foundations: Working WITH Files
modules.description: Master Gemini CLI's core features through the Basecamp Coffee scenario

lessons.name: Introduction
lessons.description: Welcome, course structure, and the Basecamp Coffee scenario

lessons.name: File Exploration & Visualization
lessons.description: Explore files, set up Cursor, discover the mess you inherited

lessons.name: Working with Files
lessons.description: @ mentions: single files, folders, templates, images, and web research

lessons.name: Commands & Navigation
lessons.description: Slash commands, custom commands (TOML), approval modes, Chain-of-Thought, and /memory

lessons.name: Agents
lessons.description: Subagents for parallel processing and multi-file analysis

lessons.name: Custom Sub-agents
lessons.description: Create permanent team members with defined perspectives using .gemini/agents/

lessons.name: GEMINI.md
lessons.description: Persistent project memory with hierarchical GEMINI.md files and /memory command

lessons.name: Power Features Overview
lessons.description: Module 1 recap, full toolkit table, and preview of advanced features

modules.name: Vibe Coding: Building FROM Scratch
modules.description: Build a real web app from requirements to deployment

lessons.name: Setup
lessons.description: Mindset shift (PM/engineer), the build loop, project folder setup

lessons.name: Plan
lessons.description: Define requirements: personality-coffee pairings, visual style, quiz questions

lessons.name: Build & Iterate
lessons.description: Scaffold Next.js, build the quiz, iterate with screenshots

lessons.name: GitHub
lessons.description: Save code to the cloud with Git and GitHub CLI

lessons.name: Go Live
lessons.description: Deploy to Vercel - your quiz goes live on the internet
